name: Pile Driving Analyzer PDA-8000S
description: Industry-standard dynamic pile testing equipment for quality assurance and bearing capacity evaluation of driven piles and drilled shafts.
software: PDI-PDA Software with real-time signal analysis
applications: Driven pile testing;Drilled shaft testing;Foundation quality assurance;Bearing capacity evaluation

name: Pile Integrity Tester
description: Non-destructive testing equipment for evaluating pile integrity and detecting defects using stress wave reflection method.
applications: Pile integrity testing;Defect detection;Quality control;Pre-construction verification

name: Static Load Test Frame
description: Heavy-duty hydraulic load testing frame for measuring actual load-settlement behavior of foundation piles.
software: Digital acquisition system with automated logging
applications: Static pile load testing;Settlement analysis;Bearing capacity verification;Ultimate load testing

name: Rotary Core Drilling Rig
description: High-performance rotary drilling rig capable of deep borehole drilling for geotechnical investigation and sampling.
applications: Soil sampling;Rock coring;Borehole logging;Permeability testing;Deep foundation investigation

name: Continuous Flight Auger Drill
description: Versatile auger drilling equipment for soil investigation and sampling in various ground conditions.
applications: Soil investigation;SPT testing;Soil sampling;Shallow foundation studies

name: Automated Triaxial Testing System
description: Fully automated triaxial testing system for determining shear strength parameters of soil specimens.
capacity: Load Capacity: 1000 kN; Confining Pressure: Up to 2000 kPa
software: GDS Lab software with automated stress path control
applications: Shear strength testing;Consolidated undrained tests;Drained triaxial tests;Research applications

name: California Bearing Ratio Apparatus
description: Precision CBR testing equipment for evaluating subgrade and base course strength for pavement design.
applications: Pavement design;Subgrade evaluation;Base course testing;Quality control

name: Automatic Compaction Test System
description: Automated compaction testing system for determining optimum moisture content and maximum dry density of soils.
software: Automated drop mechanism with digital readout
applications: Compaction control;Optimum moisture determination;Fill material testing;Earthwork QA

name: Multi-channel Analysis of Surface Waves System
description: Advanced geophysical equipment for measuring shear wave velocity and creating subsurface profiles for seismic site characterization.
applications: Seismic site classification;Shear wave velocity profiling;Liquefaction assessment;Bedrock mapping

name: Electrical Resistivity Tomography System
description: Multi-electrode resistivity imaging system for subsurface investigation and groundwater exploration.
capacity: Electrode Capacity: 84; Depth Range: Up to 500m

name: Field Vane Shear Tester
description: Portable in-situ testing device for measuring undrained shear strength of soft to medium cohesive soils.
software: Manual torque measurement with digital readout
applications: Undrained shear strength;Soft clay testing;Embankment stability;Foundation design

name: Plate Load Test Equipment
description: Hydraulic load testing equipment for determining bearing capacity and settlement characteristics of soil and pavement.
software: Hydraulic pump with digital pressure gauge and dial gauges
applications: Bearing capacity testing;Settlement analysis;Pavement evaluation;Subgrade modulus
